meta.title: Samir Alibabic - Software Engineer & Tech Founder
meta.description: I build and operate software products end-to-end — from code & data to distribution. Focus: organic growth (SEO/content/community) and clear, measurable systems.

hero.introSecondLine: Focus: organic growth (SEO/content/community) and clear, measurable systems.

buildDetails.title: Build details
buildDetails.intro: I build and run digital products end-to-end — from idea to production. I’m not tied to a specific tech stack; tools are chosen based on what the problem needs.

list.plan: What I do: plan, build, operate, measure, improve
list.workStyle: How I work: pragmatic, fast, focused on outcomes
list.also: Also: mobile/desktop/embedded when it’s the right interface

buildDetails.note: Implementation can be AI-assisted — responsibility, decisions, and review are mine.

technologies.title: Technologies
technologies.subtitle: I use the right tool for the job — with a focus on speed, reliability, and measurable outcomes.
technologies.subtitleSecondLine: Technology is a means to an end: delivery, quality, and growth come first.

about.title: About Me
about.subtitle: My background and journey
about.bioLine1: I've been building software since 2009 and have been operating products as a tech founder since 2024.
about.bioLine3: Today: organic growth, clear systems, and products with their own distribution.

footer.slogan: Innovating one product at a time

timeline.0: Supporting a team of civil engineers in GIS, IT and Web services
